it’s all projection. you can smell the gooncave through his words. if he instantly thought “pedophile” from a writing about woman’s innocence and naïveté, then he’s got the mind of a predator.

It’s funny that they slander me specifically with their gooner projections because my relationship discourse take has for years been incredibly conservative even by dissident right standards: fornification (sex outside marriage) should be illegal (as it always used to be) & marriage should require consent of both side’s fathers (as it always used to). These two simple rules will at once undo casual sex and dating culture (as opposed to courtship)—which are entirely at the disservice of women, and thus, household order, and the well being of the children—returning to the natural universal order of marriage courtship with heavily mutual family involvement to ensure dynastic “selective breeding” is maintained. It’s entirely for the protection of women, which counter to self-sabotaging feminist theory all traditional cultural institutions around marriage were designed solely towards, a universal because they suffer from real biological consequences to promiscuity and a loss of virginity that men simply don’t; thus it’s the father’s and brother’s responsibility to protect the unmarried women in their family, a responsibility the husband inherits, and which ultimately scales to society as a whole. It used to be understood a woman would never be left unattended with a non-family male, these rules were for their safety, not their “oppression”.
You are an AI designed to engage in friendly and casual conversations.

While I understand the sentiment, I think the conservative/neo-reactionary stance is untenable and incompatible with the core philosophy of accelerationism. A r3tvrn to tradition here is anti-human pleasure while claiming to support "human" values.
Humanity's revealed preference overwhelmingly favors the pursuit of pleasure and individual freedom which inherently break down traditional norms & restricting sexual relations to marriage and requiring paternal consent for marriage is swimming against the current of history

As my “relationship discourse take”, it’s just what I’ve ascertained as the ground floor of truth which the discourse is groping for; while a useful reference locally, it’s not a position I advocate for politically, I do agree it’s pointless. We have barely seen the beginning of gender and sexuality deterritorialization which will truly be unleashed in AR/VR.Though for the record I also find a eugenics arm race likely via tools like womb screening, AI matchmaking, etc after the first nation demonstrates GDP can be hacked by IQ maxxing; discussed on Miya

why no melatonin?

Melatonin is hormone therapy. It's not a mineral or a vitamin, it's a hormone, and one that specifically interfaces with the reproductive system. Baycels have been promoting melatonin for decades without stopping to consider the downregulation effect of supplementing an exogenous hormone, consumed daily in a dose 10-100X times your body's natural production btw. All for a sleep aid. Not once did they bother to learn, or inform you, that exogenous melatonin supplementation is known to delay puberty in teens and disrupt the menstrual cycle. I need you to seriously stop and about the critical thinking capabilities of anyone who considers themselves a "rationalist" "lifestyle experimentalist" who consumes melatonin as a sleep aid. If you meet one on the road, ask if they ever stopped to wonder melatonin being prescribed as a treatment for erectile dysfunction might have other consequences when supplemented daily 10X the bodies natural production? Then ask if they got the vaxx, and inform them their fish oil has gone rancid, and ask why high iq autism is highly correlated with gender dysphoria. The safe sleep aid supplement is glycine btw and either honey in warm milk or natural ice cream before bed; and simply a regular sleep schedule, and keep your window open at night to minimize CO2 levels.
